documents.document: @imawayforawalk I'm working ðŸ˜¢ but I hope for the next one!
Pls let there be filming tomorrow
I have biscuits at home! Morning saved
It's been a very stressful day, don't mind me
Like he said last night, his everlasting memory will be the affection, the support and the kindness of the people. That's what matters.
Anyway I was just talking about that side. I know there are a lot of people who love him and his doctor, who support and respect him.
@Queen_Mysterio yes absolutely!
@WEATHEREDMAN @twelfthcapaldi I generalised a little bit sorry but yes, he's very much loved as well, that's all he needs to know
He's a beautiful person who loves his job and fans, he doesn't deserve this :(
I understand if you don't like his doctor, it's ok, but it's been disrespected just because of his age, looks or portrayal of the character
I've been thinking about this all day. It breaks my heart thinking about how bad peter has been treated by people during these years.
Last night I was like "I love this interview I will listen to it every night" then the punch in the face arrived
I'm finally at home I'm screaming
Just arrived in Cardiff and of course there are aliens https://t.co/KjxHZEZJYs
Because you know I'm made of money
I've wasted 18 pounds because of a flight delay, so I had to buy another bus ticket and the coach driver didn't even have change. For real?
If life assists me, I'll be in Cardiff soon
I'm finally in Bristol dear god
Me the last couple of days https://t.co/tRDyUb5RBW
Another hour delay what the fuck
It's been 3 hours and we have to wait another more for the spare plane to arrive
I just want to be in Cardiff already
For the first time ever I'm not happy to be stuck in Venice

I hope to meet peter soon and have the courage to tell him how much his doctor meant to me.
@0hmanitsang exactly the same for me. I will forever be grateful for what he brought to my life
I have to wake up in 5 hour to go catch a plane. I better get some sleep.
@0hmanitsang i feel you... and it's not silly
This feels unreal. I'm so upset, sorry.
I'm going to miss his doctor, I'm going to miss him around Cardiff. This is harder than I thought.
I'm so grateful for what peter capaldi brought to my life. He gave me the strength and motivation to change my life.
Christmas is cancelled
This is not happening, please tell me it's not real
I'm not ready please Peter don't go
My heart just broke
I'm landing in Bristol tomorrow...
APRIL THE 15th YES
